description: Main flow for West Alert System

conditions.friendly_name: If value matches_any_of Join West-Alert-System, Join WAS

conditions.value: cancel, end, stop, stopall, unsubscribe, start, unstop, yes, help, info

conditions.friendly_name: If value matches_any_of forget-me, forget me

properties.body:
Hello, Process for your subscription to West Alert System has been initiated for *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}*.
 
Please answer the follow-up questions to subscribe via various channels to receive west alerts.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.
Alright, the process is now cancelled.

We haven't received any input for a while; the process has ended automatically.
You can send *Join WAS* anytime to restart the process.
Please input your *Employee Id* or *User Id* or *Work Email*?

Entered input is not acceptable for Employee Id or User Id or Work Email. 

In case of work email, it has to be of @westpharma.com domain.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

How do you want us to map your phone number - {{trigger.message.From| replace:'whatsapp:',''}}?

Reply with *Work* or *Personal*

Entered input is not acceptable, please reply with eith *1* or *2*.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Would you like to receive alerts to your phone number - {{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber}} via *SMS*?

Reply with YES or NO
We have mapped your Phone Number  *{{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber}}* as *{{flow.variables.PN1_NumberType}}*

Entered input is not acceptable.
 
Reply with a corresponding number.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Would you like to receive alerts to your phone number - {{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber}} via *Voice*?

Reply with YES or NO

Entered input is not acceptable.
 
Reply with a corresponding number.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Would you like to receive alerts to your phone number - {{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber}} via *WhatsApp*?

Reply with YES or NO

Entered input is not acceptable.
 
Reply with a corresponding number.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Hello *{{flow.variables.FirstName}}*,
Please review the below details for {{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber| replace:'whatsapp:',''}} and Confirm to complete the subscription process.

1. Phone Type: *{{flow.variables.PN1_NumberType}}*
2. SMS Enabled: *{{flow.variables.PN1_IsSMS}}*
3. Voice Enabled: *{{flow.variables.PN1_IsVoice}}*
4. WhatsApp Enabled: *{{flow.variables.PN1_IsWhatsApp}}*
5. Shift ID: {{flow.variables.ShiftID}}

*Terms of Use*
https://westpharmaceutical.sharepoint.com/SitePages/Legal%20Notice.aspx

If you want to change any of the above details, Reply with the corresponding number.
Ex: to change *Phone Type*, reply with *1*

Reply with *Confirm* to complete the subscription process & by Confirming you accept the *Terms of Use* of West Alert System.

Entered input is not acceptable.
  
Reply with either *Confirm* to Save the details or with a number to modify specific detail.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Hello *{{flow.variables.FirstName}}*, Your subscription to West Alert System(WAS) for your *{{flow.variables.PN1_NumberType}}* - *{{flow.variables.PN1_PhoneNumber| replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* is successful.

To subscribe from your personal email or to modify other contact details and communication preferences, visit https://was.westpharma.com
{{flow.variables.answer}}
Something went wrong!. Please try after sometime.
We will wait to hear back from you!

Please select your shift by replying to this message with corresponding number:

*1* Office Support
*2* 1st - 8 hr. shift
*3* 2nd - 8 hr. shift
*4* 3rd - 8 hr. shift
*5* Team 1/A - 12 hr. shift
*6* Team 2/B - 12 hr. shift
*7* Team 3/C - 12 hr. shift
*8* Team 4/D - 12 hr. shift

Entered input is not acceptable.
 
Reply with a corresponding number for your shift.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Thank you, we have received your message. We will review and take necessary action.

If it is an emergency, please reach out to your local security personel directly.
Hello *{{flow.variables.FirstName}}*, your WAS subscription is not successful. Please try again!

Hello *{{flow.variables.FirstName}}*, We found an existing subscription for your profile and updated the preferences as per your inputs.

To subscribe from your personal email or to modify other contact details and communication preferences, visit https://was.westpharma.com

conditions.friendly_name: If from number matcher work mobile

properties.body: Hello, You cannot modify preferences for Work Mobile.

We could not find any employee records with provided details.

Let us try again!

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

Entered input is not acceptable, please reply with eith *1* or *2*.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

We couldn't capture your message.
Please try again!

We could not find any subscription for your mobile number  *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* .

You can send *Join WAS* to subscribe to *West Alert System*.

Hello *{{widgets.func_forgetMe.parsed.SubscriberFirstName}}*,

Your number *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* is successfully removed from your *West Alert System* subscription.

You can send *Join WAS* to update your *West Alert System* subscription anytime.

Hello *{{widgets.func_forgetMe.parsed.SubscriberFirstName}}*,

We found that *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* is a work number, and work numbers are *not* allowed to forget.

Hello ,
Reply with *Confirm* to remove mobile number *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* from your *West Alert System* subscription.

Entered input is not acceptable.
  
Reply with *Confirm* to remove *{{contact.channel.address | replace:'whatsapp:',''}}* from your subscription.

Reply with *Quit* anytime during the process to end it.

We couldn't capture your message.
Please try again!

Was this a simple and engaging subscription process?
  
 1. 😀 Very Satisfied
 2. 🙂 Satisfied
 3. 😕 Dissatisfied
 4. 😦 Very Dissatisfied
Thank you for your invaluable feedback!

Hello, How can we assist you today?

*1.* Subscribe to West Alert System
*2.* Unsubscribe from West Alert System
*3.* Remove your mobile number from WAS
*4.* Alert Admin about an emergency
*5.* Respond to your recent notification

Reply with a *number* corresponding to your choice.

To *Subscribe* to West Alert System (WAS), send a message in the below format. It will initiate the subscription process and will prompt you with few questions to answer.

*Join West-Alert-System* or 
*Join WAS*

To stop receiving messages or *Unsubscribe* on this number, send a message as *STOP*. 
To start receiving messages again, you can send *START* anytime!

You can manage all your contact information and change communication preferences at https://was.westpharma.com/
To remove this number altogether from West Alert System (WAS), send a message as *forget me* and then provide your confirmation to remove it.

To *Alert* West Alert System Administrators about an incident or emergency at your workplace, Send a message in the below format. It will be available for admins to see and take necessary action. 

*IM-<Your Message>*

You can also call one of the below two numbers and record your message as VoiceMail. 

For *United States*
 +1 614 602 5789
 +1 855 957 5789 (Toll-Free)

To *Respond* to the recent Notification received on this number, send a message in the below format. 

*NR-<Your Message>*

Invalid input for the available choices. Please choose the number corresponding to your choice. 
For example, reply with *5* for *responding to recent notification*
